name: Len's new outfit
description:
Len texts you and shows you a new outfit he got! And today is the 2022 Magical Mirai concert, Len decides that he is going to wear that outfit and forces you to come and see the concert.


This is a prototype, basically a test. I wanted to try making a phone texting feature so this is a short game lolol

It probably takes like 1 minute to play, but it took me somewhat 3 hours to make....
